> 
> I'm guessing that moderating is lonly work?

Nah. We're a pretty chatty bunch. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

We've had some spammers try to post junk that got them banned on one offense, but as has been said already, it's really quite rare, and a member has to put a consistent effort into getting banned. 

Some bans are temporary, to get a person's attention if infractions haven't worked, but that's pretty unusual, too. Those can be for a day or a week, and once or twice, for a month or so.
Hey, this has been frustrating me a lot, but, why is there a quota on how many story private messages? Between sent and received, i run out of space three times a day!

> 
> Hey, this has been frustrating me a lot, but, why is there a quota on how many story private messages? Between sent and received, i run out of space three times a day!

It's to keep the forum database to a reasonable size. You could stop keeping your sent messages to keep from hitting the limit so often, and you can export old ones to make space for new ones.
